channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Sofa dumped last night, 27th February
item.description:
Last night the residents of the flats behind the pub see picture there is a gate/door as the entrance to flats behind the pub (68-70 Green lanes /Aden Grove) and dumped the sofa shown in front of the block of flats known as Newington Apartments.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Significant damage to grass verge, 27th February
item.description:
Between 86 and 92 Welling Wau therevis damage to most of the grass verge caused by delivery trucks and skip lorries. In some parts the holes are very deep and full of mud. Needs repair outside 4 properties 86,88,90 and 92.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 112, Welling Way, Falconwood, Greater London

item.title: Lamp not working in important location, 27th February
item.description:

item.title: More flytipping of dog waste bags, 27th February

item.title: Leaking overflow pipe, 27th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Galleywall Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
